string.name: animationShow_text1
string.value: 1.2016 animation slides down to invisible, the animation stops drawing. It does not affect the Grunt animation in the visible area.

string.name: animationShow_text2
string.value: 2.2016 animation and Grunt animation slide down to invisible, and both animations stop drawing.

string.name: animationShow_text3
string.value: 3. Animated hiding does not stop drawing.

string.name: reuseScenario_text
string.value: Slide down to the bottom and the animation stops drawing. Slide until the animation is visible and the animation continues to play. This is reflected in whether the drawing information is printed all the time.

string.name: hidingParentNodes_title
string.value: Parent node hidden, child canvas visible.

string.name: hidingParentNodes_title2
string.value: If the page is not drawn, the effect is normal.
